price: Dájúdájú ìpín ìyà tí ó máa jẹ àwọn tó ṣàbòsí (wọ̀nyí) ni irú ìpín ìyà tí ó jẹ ìjọ ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ (irú) wọn. Nítorí náà, kí wọ́n má ṣe kán Mi lójú (nípa ìyà wọn).
arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-inna lilladhīna ẓalamū dhanūban mith'la dhanūbi aṣḥābihim falā yastaʿjilūni
translations: so let them not ask Me to hasten
so let them not ask Me to hasten
